title: Foundational Programming Education Through 3D Collaborative Puzzle Games

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer operation skills and logical reasoning abilities
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive course conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) PBL environment for large learner groups. Requires experiential education design combining team-based collaborative learning and gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can implement basic programming structures such as conditionals and loops using block-based programming tools in a 3D virtual environment
Learners can visualize and explain logical thinking processes for problem-solving while solving collaborative puzzles
Learners can evaluate their cognitive/behavioral engagement levels by analyzing in-game interaction records
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
